name: Document Generator
description: A application for land surveyors built on top of OpenOffice, which takes input values from the user and optionally an XML data file and generates documents using user specified templates. The values given by the user or read from the XML are either filled directly in the templates or are used to build tables and hide / show sections.

The file selection, template selection and the input field for the optional XML file.
